fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Steal someone's identity at night. 3 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your target must die, or your ability fails and you lose a charge of your ability.
- At the beginning of the game, your presence is announced. Day chats are used through bot relays instead.
- When stealing someone's identity, you will appear dead, and your own will and role will be revealed. You will be able to send messages as the player whose identity you stole.
- If your target had a factional chat, you have access to that factional chat. Additionally, your whispers appear to be from your target as well.
